issue.title: [Python] Unit tests in arrow/python fail to link on some OS X platforms
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-753](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-753). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We're using `-undefined dynamic_lookup` to avoid linking to libpython at link time in the Cython extensions, but this causes problems when building the unit tests in some Python environments.
